content: हिंसा [हिंस्-अ] {@--1@} Injury, mischief, wrong, harm, hurt (said to be of three kinds:--कायिक ‘personal’, वाचिक ‘verbal’, and मानसिक ‘mental’); अहिंसा परमो धर्मः. {@--2@} Killing, slaying, destruction; <ls>R. 5. 57</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 313</ls>; <ls>Ms. 10. 63.</ls> {@--3@} Robbery, plunder.
